record.dc:title: 9MCL6, 15MCL6, McLean County, Kentucky. Eaton Site. Soil Profile.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Camera located at an oblique angle from the profile and the photograph indicates the plowline; Level #1; and sub-plowline topsoil. Level #1, first interpreted as the beginning of made soil of the mound, later developed to be a zone of more pronounced leaching tip of posthole penetrating into subplowline topsoil from Level #1 should penetrate through Level #1. From Notes: Weather -- Cloudy. Adjustments -- f 32; 1 sec. Subject -- 67.5' profile showing Level #1 of disturbed soil. Scope -- R-2 - L-7.
